data.comment: The big names in today's match at São Januario have now been confirmed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Gustavo Gomez (Palmeiras) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 5, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 6, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Palmeiras.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Palmeiras are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 23, Palmeiras have a dangerous throw-in.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Anderson Daronco signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 31, Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Palmeiras.
Throw-in high up the field for Vasco da Gama in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 33, Anderson Daronco awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 36, Vasco da Gama's Martin Benitez gets in a shot on goal at São Januario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Can Palmeiras capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Leo Matos is booked for the home team.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Palmeiras just outside Vasco da Gama's area.
In the minute 43, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Vasco da Gama's Fernando Miguel looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino is back in action after a slight knock.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Attention is being given to Vasco da Gama’s Fernando Miguel and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 45, Gabriel Menino is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In the minute 46, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Martin Benitez.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Palmeiras pushes forward through Rony, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 49, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Anderson Daronco awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 52, Anderson Daronco signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at São Januario.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
In Rio de Janeiro Palmeiras attack through Rony. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Palmeiras.
German Cano of Vasco da Gama smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 57, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 60, Marcos Rocha is on a sub for Gabriel Menino for Palmeiras.
Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Gustavo Scarpa is replacing Gabriel Veron for the away team.
Vasco da Gama's Andrey breaks free at São Januario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
In the minute 64, Vasco da Gama make their first substitution with Carlinhos replacing Martin Benitez.
The home team replace Leonardo Gil with Marcos Junior.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Anderson Daronco.
In the minute 65, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 67, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Fernando Miguel for Vasco da Gama who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The away team have replaced Rony with Lucas Lima. This is the third substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
Fernando Miguel is back on the pitch.
In the minute 71, Willian is on a sub for Raphael Veiga for Palmeiras.
Palmeiras have been given a penalty at São Januario...
In the minute 73, It's advantage Palmeiras in Rio de Janeiro as Luiz Adriano scores from the spot to make it 0-1.
Anderson Daronco signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Anderson Daronco signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Anderson Daronco waits before resuming play because Luiz Adriano for Palmeiras is still down.
In the minute 78, Danilo (Palmeiras) has replaced the possibly injured Luiz Adriano.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 80, Felipe Melo is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) is making a third substitution, with Gustavo Torres replacing German Cano.
In the minute 83, Ricardo Sa Pinto is making the team's fourth substitution at São Januario with Ribamar replacing Andrey.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Palmeiras.
Anderson Daronco awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 86, Vinicius is replacing Ricardo Graca for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Matias Vina (Palmeiras) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama drive forward through Gustavo Torres. His shot is on target but it's saved.
The fourth official's board shows 7 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Rio de Janeiro.
Anderson Daronco signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anderson Daronco awards the away team a throw-in.
Anderson Daronco awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
Anderson Daronco blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
Lucas Lima (Palmeiras) has received a yellow card from Anderson Daronco.
